name: Election of Felix Faure as President of France
obverse: Bust of Felix Faure facing left
reverse: The female personification of the French republic facing left and lifting the veil on the election of the new president. In the background is a cityscape, a beehive, and a man plowing a field.
description: Félix François Faure (30 January 1841 – 16 February 1899) was President of France from 1895 until his death in 1899.
On the edge of the medal is a cornucopia and 'BRONZE'.
